channel.title: CVE Feed for OSD Subscribe -- OSD Subscribe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSD Subscribe -- OSD Subscribe

item.title: CVE-2021-38351|2024-08-04T01:37:16.462Z -- osd%20subscribe -- osd%20subscribe
item.description: The OSD Subscribe WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the osd_subscribe_message parameter found in the ~/options/osd_subscribe_options_subscribers.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.2.3.
